reliquary:VaporAmbrosia.NAME: Ambrosial Vapor
reliquary:VaporAmbrosia.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! Mantra. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporAncientPotion.NAME: Ancient Vapor
reliquary:VaporAncientPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Remove 1 Artifact from the enemy. NL Exhaust.
reliquary:VaporAncientPotion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Remove 1 Artifact from ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporAttackPotion.NAME: Maddening Vapor
reliquary:VaporAttackPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add a random Attack card into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
reliquary:VaporAttackPotion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add !M! copies of a random Attack card into your hand. They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporBlessingOfTheForge.NAME: Quenching Vapor
reliquary:VaporBlessingOfTheForge.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Upgrade a random card in your hand for the rest of combat. NL Exhaust.
reliquary:VaporBlessingOfTheForge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Upgrade half of the cards in your hand for the rest of combat, at random, rounded up. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporBlockPotion.NAME: Enshrouding Vapor
reliquary:VaporBlockPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporBloodPotion.NAME: Blood Vapor
reliquary:VaporBloodPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Heal for !M! percent of your NL Max HP. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporBottledMiracle.NAME: Miraculous Vapor
reliquary:VaporBottledMiracle.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add a *Miracle into your hand. NL Exhaust.
reliquary:VaporBottledMiracle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add a *Miracle+ into your hand. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporColorlessPotion.NAME: Transparent Vapor
reliquary:VaporColorlessPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add a random Colorless card into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
reliquary:VaporColorlessPotion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add !M! copies of a random Colorless card into your hand. They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporCultistPotion.NAME: Ritual Vapor
reliquary:VaporCultistPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain 1 Ritual and lose !M! Strength.

reliquary:VaporCunningPotion.NAME: Deceptive Vapor
reliquary:VaporCunningPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add a *Shiv+ into your hand. NL Exhaust.
reliquary:VaporCunningPotion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add !M! *Shiv+ into your hand. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporDistilledChaos.NAME: Chaotic Vapor
reliquary:VaporDistilledChaos.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Play the top card of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
reliquary:VaporDistilledChaos.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Play the top !M! cards of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporDuplicationPotion.NAME: Vaporous Vapor
reliquary:VaporDuplicationPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL This turn, your next cost 0 or 1 card is played twice. NL Exhaust.
reliquary:VaporDuplicationPotion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL This turn, your next !M! cost 0 or 1 cards are played twice. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporElixir.NAME: Cleansing Vapor
reliquary:VaporElixir.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exhaust a random Status or Curse card in your hand. NL Exhaust.
reliquary:VaporElixir.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exhaust all Status and Curse cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporEntropicBrew.NAME: Entropic Vapor
reliquary:VaporEntropicBrew.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL A random one of your potions turns into a new potion. NL Exhaust.
reliquary:VaporEntropicBrew.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Each of your potions turns into a new potion. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporEssenceOfDarkness.NAME: Dark Vapor
reliquary:VaporEssenceOfDarkness.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Trigger the passive ability of all Dark orbs. NL Exhaust.
reliquary:VaporEssenceOfDarkness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Trigger the passive ability of all Dark orbs !M! times. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporExplosivePotion.NAME: Explosive Vapor
reliquary:VaporExplosivePotion.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporFairyInABottle.NAME: Insulating Vapor
reliquary:VaporFairyInABottle.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Prevent the next time you would lose HP. NL Exhaust.
reliquary:VaporFairyInABottle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Prevent the next !M! times you would lose HP. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporFearPotion.NAME: Menacing Vapor
reliquary:VaporFearPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporFirePotion.NAME: Fiery Vapor
reliquary:VaporFirePotion.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporFlexPotion.NAME: Beefy Vapor
reliquary:VaporFlexPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporFocusPotion.NAME: Concentrated Vapor
reliquary:VaporFocusPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! Focus. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporFruitJuice.NAME: Fruity Vapor
reliquary:VaporFruitJuice.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! Max HP. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporGamblersBrew.NAME: Shifting Vapor
reliquary:VaporGamblersBrew.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard 1 card at random, then draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.
reliquary:VaporGamblersBrew.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard your hand, then draw that many cards. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporGhostInAJar.NAME: Ghostly Vapor
reliquary:VaporGhostInAJar.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL !M! percent chance to apply 1 Intangible. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporLiquidMemories.NAME: Deja Vapor
reliquary:VaporLiquidMemories.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Return a random card from your discard pile to your hand. NL Exhaust.
reliquary:VaporLiquidMemories.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Return !M! random cards from your discard pile to your hand. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporPoisonPotion.NAME: Poisonous Vapor
reliquary:VaporPoisonPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply !M! Poison. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporPowerPotion.NAME: Powerful Vapor
reliquary:VaporPowerPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add a random Power card into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
reliquary:VaporPowerPotion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add !M! copies of a random Power card into your hand. They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporSkillPotion.NAME: Glowing Vapor
reliquary:VaporSkillPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add a random Skill card into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
reliquary:VaporSkillPotion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add !M! copies of a random Skill card into your hand. They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporSmokeBomb.NAME: Obscuring Vapor
reliquary:VaporSmokeBomb.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Spend !M! Gold to escape from a non-boss combat. Receive no rewards. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I don't have the Gold to distract them!

reliquary:VaporSneckoOil.NAME: Hissing Vapor
reliquary:VaporSneckoOil.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Randomize the costs of half of the cards in your hand, rounded up. NL Exhaust.
reliquary:VaporSneckoOil.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Randomize the cost of cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporSpeedPotion.NAME: Brisk Vapor
reliquary:VaporSpeedPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporStancePotion.NAME: Poised Vapor
reliquary:VaporStancePotion.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL If you aren't in a Stance, enter Calm or Wrath randomly. NL Exhaust.
reliquary:VaporStancePotion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL If you are in Calm or Wrath, enter the other stance. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I can't do that while in a Stance.
I must be in Calm or Wrath to do that.

reliquary:VaporSwiftPotion.NAME: Swift Vapor
reliquary:VaporSwiftPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.
reliquary:VaporSwiftPotion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporUnknownPotion.NAME: Unknown Vapor
reliquary:VaporUnknownPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add a random Vapor card into your hand. NL Exhaust.
reliquary:VaporUnknownPotion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add !M! random Vapor cards into your hand. NL Exhaust.

reliquary:VaporWeakPotion.NAME: Sickly Vapor
reliquary:VaporWeakPotion.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.
